QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT(d.Member_ID, LEN(d.Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT(d.Claim_ID, LEN(d.Claim_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, 0 AS condition_concept_id, d.admission_date AS condition_start_date, CASE WHEN d.Type_of_claim = 'Outpatient' THEN 32859 ELSE 32853 END AS condition_type_concept_id, CAST('1' + RIGHT(d.institution_id, LENGTH(d.institution_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS associated_provider_id, replace(icd10_level4_code, '-', '') condition_lookup_key, icd10_level4_code AS condition_source_value, CASE WHEN d.Type_of_claim = 'DPC' and Outcome in (6,7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as died1, CASE WHEN d.Type_of_claim != 'DPC' and Outcome = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as died2, month_and_year_of_start_of_medical_care as month_and_year_of_start, d.month_and_year_of_medical_care as month_and_year, CAST(CAST(month_and_year_of_start_of_medical_care AS VARCHAR(8)) AS DATE) as start_m_and_y_date, Suspicion_flag as suspicion_flag, 1 as fake FROM {sc}.Diagnosis d join {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.Member_ID = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by CAST(RIGHT(d.Member_ID, LEN(d.Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT)
